meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alex Stoy Jim Craner Rebecca Rider Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6576.

td.p: Alex Stoy, a student from Tarzana, California
Jim Craner, a website developer from Riverton, Illinois
Rebecca Rider, an office supply sales assistant from Fresh Meadows, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $46,400)

tr.td: GIRTH OF A NATION
THANK "Q" VERY MUCH
PAPER
GOOD EATS
THE U.S. CONSTITUTION
& HERE'S YOUR HOST...
